website_summaries.verdict: The Cat S60 is a unique unlocked phone with an extra-rugged body and a built-in thermal imaging camera, but it's relatively costly for the specs.
cons: Back flap can pop open upon impact

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Durability is good, but that's about it. Connection has got super slow even with super fast broadband and factory resetting the phone. Apps are soooo slow on the device. Camera is beyond crap. Sound is woeful and speaker crackles on calls. Basically it's a crap phone that will last forevee, that's the trade off! Also the seller didn't want to know when I contacted them as I was '3' days over my 30 day warranty. Joke.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Judge

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy piece of  equipment
customer_reviews.text: Still working it out as the instructions are so minute you need a magnifying glass to read them. Seems to be good for purpose but is quite heavy.
customer_reviews.author: turkadin

customer_reviews.title: Problems
customer_reviews.text: Could not form contacts into groups which was a function I need on a daily basis. Cannot choose which texts to delete unless one by one or delete all. Difficulty with copy and paste.Cannot move files from phone to laptop another function that is important to me. Could not get hold of techlovers to try and resolve problems. Otherwise happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Tough as chocolate lasted 4 days slid out of my pocket in the digger and the screen shattered idea is great but no where near good enough considering the price went back to Samsung they can't stand more abuse
customer_reviews.author: Lee Dowley-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Thermal Imaging Camera works well.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life a bit short. But features and functions extremely useful. Thermal Imaging Camera is an extremely useful piece of kit.
customer_reviews.author: Smiler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's just brilliant!!! It's not just a phone, it's an advanced testing equipment. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: If you can justify needing thermal imaging, get one!
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life, virtually indestructible. I probably wouldn't buy a case unless it's got a belt clip as the phone is already quite big in your pocket!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bee

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to it's name - indestructible!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is perfect for people like me, "butterfingers" who always drop their mobile phones. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly_Conaghan

customer_reviews.title: Thermal imaging camera
customer_reviews.text: It's an exceptional phone. I'm particularly putting the thermal imaging camera to good use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. P. Carney

customer_reviews.title: Happy Daddy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my dad who is a contractor. He loves this phone as it's not the usual iPhone or samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy another
customer_reviews.text: Great phone CATS60 as I had S41 CAT great battery great outer covers it been in water few knocks never a problem
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Meenehan

customer_reviews.title: i will not buy another Cat device again
customer_reviews.text: The batterie has failed on this divice really disappointed, it was around £500
customer_reviews.author: Mark Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Buy it new
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s a great fone, but used doesn’t worth to buy us I did
customer_reviews.author: Silva

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase and would recommend for some one who wants a ruff phone
customer_reviews.author: Amar

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: Everything was quite good. The product is in perfect state and was delivered right on time. We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Florencia Abram

customer_reviews.title: Built for greatness
customer_reviews.text: I drop my phone almost everyday. This has been doing fine, ive dropped it at least 3 metres once and i cant find the scratch on it. Ive also ran over this with my car (hyundai i30). Seems to be no damaged. Ive also thrown my phone at someone to test how strong it was, my friend got a bruise... I found a good use for the thermal imaging camera, i use it to see how hot some women really are according to my phone, it really helps with breaking the ice. I would highly recommend this phone if you are clumsy, outdoorsy, or want to spy on women using the thermal imaging camera.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Patel

customer_reviews.title: not happy
customer_reviews.text: product after a few months goes faulty we have already had replacement now says we cannot have another with the same problem not year old and over 500 pound not a happy person
customer_reviews.author: wendy nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Almost great product sadly let down by several technical issues...
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bit of kit,sadly have experienced several technical issues that mean I cannot recommend this product.phone is gltchy and locked on do not disturb setting,frequently turns off, numerous times people have tried to call me and didn't get through despite phone being on and signal etc OK... including an emergency situation where my partner broke her foot and needed help, lord knows how many businesses calls haven't got through potentially costing me money and reputation... Phone will turn itself off frequently even with key guard engaged, and have found myself unable to access internet or even text messaging when showing full connection.please supply a replacement or refund asap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: crappy s60 off you go to mazuma
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this phone two stars .. Massively over priced for what it is. It is not water proof so do not dunk it in the bath ....Or swimming pool.. Battery is rubbish and have to constantly charge. The camera lens gets condensation in it And the flr stopped work the screen went green.... Learned my lesson thought spending that amount of my hard earned money and a rugged work phone would do it...But alas I've been mugged off ... The speaker cover came off after one month...
customer_reviews.author: Mark13

customer_reviews.title: Beast of a phone.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Really good sound, Take beautiful photo's, Thermal imaging works accurate. Has 32GB internal storage. Plus can add about 64GB or 128GB TF card for added storage. Gorilla glass 4 is really strong can take a battering. The phone is really light and quite thin. It has a SOS button in case of an emergency, this phone can be used under water, u can switch it to 2M or 5M there's a little switch for both speakers at the top and bottom. The phone has small fans inside them u can activate after use of being underwater with the phone. Overall a brilliant phone that is way past the Mil Spec.
customer_reviews.author: Tru3

customer_reviews.title: ROW vs NA phone.  Beware
customer_reviews.text: Know the difference. A phone purchased overseas will be a ROW (rest of the world) phone vs a NA (north america) phone. They operate in different frequency ranges and performance will suck etc depending on your location. Otherwise, a cool phone. My only beef is that the SD card sometimes needs to be reset.
customer_reviews.author: A Pearsol

customer_reviews.title: Good high quality product, reasonably priced, a lot phone for the price, I can’t emphasise the recommendation it’s an excellent
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awesome with thermal imaging camera, powerful tool for many applications, especially for field service engineer who needs to diagnose problems where temperatures are concerned, this phone is very fast it’s full of good features, I’m a field service engineer and the phone is proving to be godsend, it’s waterproof at 5M, 4G dual sim, very fast and easy to setup, highly recommend piece of kit, very robust design, comes with screen protector too,everything is clearly marked and very user friendly. You don’t need any special tools to access SIM card. Superb all around.
customer_reviews.author: PA

customer_reviews.title: Actually like the bulkiness as you always know it's with you
customer_reviews.text: Everything I needed. One month in all as should be. Actually like the bulkiness as you always know it's with you , not fallen out of your pockets. Seems as fast as any other phone I've had in the past, screen clarity is good and camera more than sufficient. Thermal imaging a bonus. All in all...A great buy and won't be going back to fragile iPhone or any other like phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The camera is horrible.
customer_reviews.text: Camera focus is horrible, no video stabilization, the speaker grill is getting easily damaged. Too bad, I was loving the design.
customer_reviews.author: icXu

customer_reviews.title: All in all a great phone. The touchscreen is far too sensitive however ...
customer_reviews.text: All in all a great phone. The touchscreen is far too sensitive however and to say it's a tough phone it marks a bit too easy if you knock it. I'd still recommend it, as the pro's far outweigh the cons.
customer_reviews.author: gary brook

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a fan of android but managed to customize it to be almost like my old BB
customer_reviews.text: A bit heavy, but that's heavy-duty phone. I'm not a fan of android but managed to customize it to be almost like my old BB.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Normal camera is not so good - it is too slow. But, phone has other interesting features.
customer_reviews.author: em

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Everything I ever wanted with an Android ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Everything I ever wanted with an Android phone, Long battery life, waterproof and many other features. Just waiting to see when it updates to Android Nougat, as it is nearly pure. It is heavier and larger than most, but it is still my ideal phone.
customer_reviews.author: Brunogn

customer_reviews.title: If you break phones this is for you
customer_reviews.text: Having gone through several phones with working away in harsh conditions this phone has proved to be one tough beast! been dropped several times and even survived being slammed with a van door (slipped out of pocket as shut the door) The thermal camera seemed like abit of a gimiick but has proved surprisingly helpful for checking hot spots and even good for finding air locks in central heating systems.
customer_reviews.author: Angus Haig`

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Have had this phone 18 months after having to send the first one back due to faults. Now this one won’t let people call through and is glitchy and no mater how hard I try I can’t get anyone from amazon to sort it out. £500 for a phone that lasts 18 months is not a good deal.The idea is great but in reality it’s rubbish and the customer service sucks. :l
customer_reviews.author: Steve Rawlings

customer_reviews.title: very happy. the 1 drawback is the slippy finish of ...
customer_reviews.text: very happy. the 1 drawback is the slippy finish of the back. it can slide out of your hand if your grip isnt very tight
customer_reviews.author: kevin campbell

customer_reviews.title: First phone had to be sent back due to crackling ...
customer_reviews.text: First phone had to be sent back due to crackling audio. Second phone has now started having bluetooth audio problems. Camera is appalling.
customer_reviews.author: FB

customer_reviews.title: Terrible phone- constant problems
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this phone, the attention to detail in manufacture and software is incredibly poor! My phone had endless problems, from the camera failing to the software randomly crashing the phone in the middle of conversations... wish I'd never bought it!
customer_reviews.author: jamie

product_meta.title: CATERPILLAR CAT S60 Thermal Imaging Dual SIM UK Android Smartphone - Black
product_meta.description:
A Turning Point in Smartphone Innovation. Be among the first to have the world's first thermal imaging integrated and most waterproof smartphone. Revolutionise the way you work with the power of thermal in your hands. See the World Differently. The first of its kind, the Cat S60 gives you access to thermal imaging expertise from your smartphone. Utilising Flir's exclusive MSX Technology, this rugged smartphone will give you clear thermal imagery and multiple spot meters will allow you to retroactively pinpoint a temperature in your image. Like a Fish to Water. The world's most waterproof smartphone can survive depths of up to 5 meters for 60 minutes using our unique lockdown switch. The S60 can also take underwater photographs and video, as well as boasting a glove and wet-finger compatible touchscreen. Keep Cool in Tough Situations. Drop-proof to 1.8m and reinforced with a strengthened die cast frame, the Cat S60 exceeds even military specifications, making it the perfect companion to those living out rugged lifestyles.

BOX CONTAINS
CAT S60 SIM Free Smartphone, 3 PIN UK Mains Adapter,USB Cable, Documentation
feature_bullets: Non-removable Lithium Ion with Quick Charge 2.0

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
